mapper.select: select count(*) as total from qna where pId=#{pId}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (uId, pId, qnaTitle, qnaContent, qnaDate, isSecret, isAnswered, qnaAnswer, pName, uName) values (#{uId},#{pId},#{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent},now(),#{isSecret},#{isAnswered},#{qnaAnswer},#{pName},#{uName})
mapper.update: update qna set qnaTitle = #{qnaTitle},qnaContent = #{qnaContent},isSecret = #{isSecret} where qnaId=#{qnaId}
update qna set qnaAnswer = #{qnaAnswer},isAnswered =1 where qnaId=#{qnaId}
